item.description:
Come Laugh from 2-3 pm for a Laughter Class
Laughter Yoga is based on the idea that our brains do not know the difference between real laughter and fake laughter so by "practicing"laughter we get all the same health benefits as really laughing (and true laughter usually ensues, too!)
In Laughter Yoga, we laugh for no reason, not because we have a sense of humor, are in a good mood, or think something is funny. we laugh simply because laughing is good for us!
item.how_to_find_us: Go up Stairs-take right-go through doorway up stairs
item.name: Maine Laughter Yoga Club-Bath
